website_summaries.verdict: The Olympus SP-620UZ is an affordable, compact (but not pocket size) superzoom camera with a 21x zoom lens. It's affordably priced, but not as refined as its pricier competition.
cons: Image quality suffers at high ISOs
Cannot adjust zoom while recording video

customer_reviews.title: Great camera awesome price
customer_reviews.text: Very nice camera,takes great pictures. Very simple to navigate software on it. Paid 45$ with shipping. Came with memory card but no data cord or strap. Paid 8 bucks for cord and strap.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a great camera. I use it for everything
customer_reviews.text: . This is a great camera. I use it for everything. I can carry it in my purse and it adjusts easily. Have taken all sorts of picture with it. Very high quality in my opinion. Love how I can take close ups of just about anything from bugs to far away objects like landscapes or even birds sitting in trees. Love the zoom feature. Was able to take pictures of my sons graduation from college even though quite far from the stage. Was able to zoom in and take close ups of him. Also has a very nice video feature and have even taken videos at night. I love this camera!
customer_reviews.author: Lildi

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Given that this was designed as a point and shoot with a ultra long zoom, it is great value at well under $200.00. This is not for those that want to do professional level photography. This camera takes very nice pictures in decent light, gives you a great telephoto reach, allows ultra close up macro photography and is easy to use. Certainly a great deal for the target audience. If you like to just point and shoot, get nice pictures and want a long zoom, you should consider this camera.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Great camera.
customer_reviews.text: No complaints with this one other than what everyone seems to dislike. The lense cover falls off. I fixed it by putting a small dab of epoxy on the edge. Provides just the right amount of fit to keep it on the camera. It takes great photos and is easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Olympus SP-620UZ 16MP Digital Camera with 21x Optical Zoom (Black)
customer_reviews.text: This camera works perfectly for my needs. The only thing I didn't like about the camera was it would time-out very quickly and if took me a while to learn to press the picture button halfway to get the camera to be ready to take pictures. Great quality. Did go through a lot of batteries (thank goodness for AA batteries!) when I was using screen and video and extra display options instead of auto focus.
customer_reviews.author: M. Jurek

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: this was a very good deal.. it came with extras, like case. still $20 less than walmart.
customer_reviews.author: HowieTC

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: The camera does everything I would expect and more. It is easy to use and takes excellent pictures. Great resolution and the optical zoom allows you get in close even when you are not!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Lauer

customer_reviews.title: Gift
customer_reviews.text: Gift for my son, he picked it out. He really likes it, uses it for pics and video. I haven't had a chance to get my hands on it yet! But I like the size and the optical zoom.
customer_reviews.author: peggiebennett

customer_reviews.title: simply good
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a good buy specs, quality and cost wise. This product gave all those aspects with great ease. Olympus quality pictures and videos with a very affordable price.
customer_reviews.author: E. J. de Cuba

customer_reviews.title: all good except that.
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about it except the scroll square button thing is way to sensitive.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Collins

customer_reviews.title: but takes great pics.
customer_reviews.text: A little complicated for a point & shoot, but takes great pics.
customer_reviews.author: frank t. seaman

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT DEAL
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this product and wish there were more deals like this. I didn't even have to read instructions. It was very easy to figure out. I bought this as a gift but decided to keep it for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Puppy Chulos Placement, Inc

customer_reviews.title: great camera.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great camera for the price. I love it. It is close enough to professional for the professional, but easy enough to operate for the nonprofessional.
customer_reviews.author: AMW

customer_reviews.title: worth it
customer_reviews.text: good experience looking for the transition to the reflex or pro cameras. Difficult to find something better for $99 bucks
customer_reviews.author: Cliente de Amazon

customer_reviews.title: need it
customer_reviews.text: wish it had a rechargeable battery but still a good price for the camera and I look forward to using it
customer_reviews.author: Carlton B Wagoner

customer_reviews.title: I bought this to take pictures of my sons birthday and the pictures were not good quality. My phone takes better pictures than t
customer_reviews.text: Camera was not what I expected. I bought this to take pictures of my sons birthday and the pictures were not good quality. My phone takes better pictures than this camera. Requested a return.
customer_reviews.author: angie

customer_reviews.title: Good value for money
customer_reviews.text: Bought thsi as a birthday preent to myself and I am very pleased with it. It was very good value for money and i've taken some amazing shots with it. Not necessarily a SLR but still very good
customer_reviews.author: M. C. Agbara

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Really good camera, is the best investment that I did. It's really important buy the bag case to protect it
customer_reviews.author: Fabricio Vasquez

customer_reviews.title: LOVE TAKING PICTURES WITH THIS!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am not a professional but the way this camera takes pictures and the amazing quality of it you wouldn't know the difference!
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: very good for the price. you cannot buy anything better then the olympus digital camera. the price that i paid was 99 dollars.
customer_reviews.author: ang

customer_reviews.title: the camera not work
customer_reviews.text: the olympus sp-620UZ generated the error-zoom camera When turn I could not make photographs. This camera came with operating problems. at the time of purchase, the seller indicated that it was a camera used in very good condition. however I have sent a camera rebuilt. Please I request the change of the camera for one that works. note: the camera generates "Zoom Error" when turning.
customer_reviews.author: Angel Blanco

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy on Black Friday
customer_reviews.text: Got this thing for $99 on black friday, awesome camera at an awesome price. Better than a lot of the cheap DSLR style cameras out there. And for the record, over the other reviews, you CAN zoom and record audio at the same time while recording video. Got it on time, love it to death. Recommended highly!
customer_reviews.author: Jak

customer_reviews.title: Less than expected
customer_reviews.text: Takes blurry inside pictures on default settings . Had to figure out how to set up properly for inside pictures. I looked at many positive reviews of this camera , which is why I purchased it . Most places are calling this a point and click type camera but you will have to experiment with settings before you begin taking great pictures. This is the best price I could find for this camera "post black friday"
customer_reviews.author: David Wisniewski

customer_reviews.title: Overall average buy, decent buy for the price (100$)
customer_reviews.text: This looks to be a very impressive camera reading the specifications of this model. But the picture quality wasn't so good even in day light conditions. Very simple and easy to operate though. A good gift for not-so-tech savvy parents.
customer_reviews.author: Anuraag Gupta

customer_reviews.title: good camera
customer_reviews.text: Although there are 18MP pixel or more zoom, but this camera is very good and nice, It would take more time to focus and show the picture, but the result is great
customer_reviews.author: G. Yau

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: great camera for the price....especially with the pixels and will recommend it to everyone. Great price for a good deal
customer_reviews.author: Cecil O.

customer_reviews.title: I love it. It takes great pics for the novice
customer_reviews.text: I love it. It takes great pics for the novice. I downloaded the manual and was faithful to use it. This camera can do so much! I took it on a tour in Israel, and my pics are ver beautiful and the detail-wonderful. A great investment!
customer_reviews.author: Marci E Hukill

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Alittle complicated for me but the pictures that I have taken are good
customer_reviews.author: gary reitz

customer_reviews.title: Technology challenged
customer_reviews.text: Keep in mind that I am technology challenged and still playing around with camera. With that in the open, as far as I can tell, this will be a great camera. Shots taken in house with pets in motion have turned out clear, so there is some form of stabilization built into camera. Zoom feature nice, but need to play with it more to get used to looking, zooming, and clicking. It looks bulky, but the right side of camera has perfect grip. I really like it, just hope that I can get acquainted with all features.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie M Blunk

customer_reviews.title: the camera is good, but it came with defect.
customer_reviews.text: Good camera for the sale. We had to return it because it had a bad screen.
customer_reviews.author: Azael O.

customer_reviews.title: beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a camera for my father to use who is visually impaired. I found this and could not be happier with it. The screen is large and shows an extremely clear picture that even he can appreciate. It is simple to use with relatively few buttons. Obviously bulky for a digital camera, but just what he was looking for in terms of having something larger to handle. It runs on batteries which is more convenient than having to plug it in prior to use, and I purchased rechargeable sets for him to use. I would recommend this to anyone looking for a simple to use camera that takes fantastic photos!
customer_reviews.author: country wife

customer_reviews.title: Worst Camera
customer_reviews.text: Worst camera I ever bought, takes horrible pictures and very cumbersome. I used it a total of 2x in a year. It's sad when your phone takes a better picture than this camera.
customer_reviews.author: Vince

customer_reviews.title: Nice size and feel
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a better camera with more features. This has been good. I'm still learning about all the features.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck Willihnganz

customer_reviews.title: Olympus SP-620UZ 16MP Digital Camera with 21x Optical Zoom (Black)
customer_reviews.text: I really love my camera. It takes great pictures for a camera that's about $150. It has 3D, Panorama, and has 21X optical zoom. I think it's veyr easy to use and it's light weight for a larger camera. I would recommend this to anyone who wants an everyday camera.
customer_reviews.author: Shady Yang

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the price, but would agree about the finish and the lens cover issues.
customer_reviews.text: As others stated, the lens cover doesn't stay on well. Also, the chrome finished areas also look a little toy like. Overall, it takes nice pictures for the price. I little better than a point and shoot, but not quite the same as an SLR. For the money paid, I didn't expect it would be. This was given to my adult daughter as a gift. Will have to see how she feels about it as she uses it.
customer_reviews.author: deborah a davis

customer_reviews.title: olymus sp-620uz 16 mp digital camera with 21 x optical zoom [ black]
customer_reviews.text: it's hard to hold the camera still when taking movies. i like the pic. it takes . the size of it is good
customer_reviews.author: tony comito

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: Its a nice camera, You have to learn to make Photos, if You usually dont use zoom. I bougth recargable AA bateríes, so that point its not important for me.
customer_reviews.author: Klaus-Dieter Rose

customer_reviews.title: great deal
customer_reviews.text: outstanding product with many choices to shoot a pic. simple operation with online guide. photos are excellent and 16 pix.
customer_reviews.author: philip. Marcin

product_meta.title: Olympus SP-620UZ 16MP Digital Camera with 21x Optical Zoom (Black) (Old Model)
product_meta.description:
Color:BlackGet into range with this 21x long zoom camera without breaking the bank. A dedicated, One-Touch HD Video button allows you to quickly record high-quality images, while Magic Art

FROM THE MANUFACTURER


 Get into range with this 21x long zoom camera without breaking the bank. The SP-620UZ is ideal for the traveler, outdoorsy type, or sports enthusiast who wants to capture the action from a distance. A dedicated, One-Touch HD Video button allows you to quickly record high-quality images, while Magic Art Filters like Watercolor and Reflection let your creativity shine through. The big 3.0" LCD screen lets you easily share your adventures with friends and family. 

Olympus SP-620UZ Highlights 

21X ULTRA-ZOOM
The 21x zoom lets you get incredibly close to your subject while the 28mm wide-angle lens lets you zoom back out for stunning panoramas and group shots. 

HD VIDEO
A simple, one-touch button allows you to record movies with amazing clarity in high-definition, right from your camera. 

HIGH-SPEED SEQUENTIAL SHOOTING
Never miss a moment! With 7fps high-speed sequential shooting, capture the perfect shot by taking a sequence of images all at once. Perfect for everything from fast action sporting events to kids and pets at play.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars63 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
